SEARCH
Package database

Class Account

java.lang.Object
database.Account
public class Account extends Object
The Account class represents a bank account with associated transactions.

  • Constructor Summary

      public Account(int idaccounts, int user_id, String name, double value)
      Constructs an Account object with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      idaccounts - The unique identifier for the account
      user_id - The user ID associated with the account
      name - The name of the account
      value - The initial balance of the account

      public void updateTransaction(Transaction transaction, String name, double amount, String date, int type)
      Updates the details of a transaction in the list of transactions associated with the account.
      Parameters:
      transaction - The transaction to update
      name - The new name for the transaction
      amount - The new amount for the transaction
      date - The new date for the transaction
      type - The new type for the transaction
